casebody.data:
State
v.
Terril Courtney Battle 464P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2016.

Mr. Nicholas C. Woomer-Deters, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Battle, Terril Courtney.

Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Ernie Lee, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of December 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of December 2016."
